name: Desert Clearing
description: Open space where nothing grows. Just packed sand and scattered stones. Horizon visible in all directions. No shelter, no shade, no markers.
lighting_quality: Overwhelming. Sun or stars, nothing diffuses the light. Everything is exposed.
temperature_range: Extreme in both directions. Hottest and coldest location.
acoustic_quality: Wind dominates. Voices get stolen. Silence is heavy.
objects_present: Scattered stones (some stacked, unclear by whom)
Single wooden post (purpose unclear, no other structures)
atmosphere: Austere and honest. A space that offers nothing but itself.
